snippet: As their homes have become more technologically advanced, travelers want at least as much technology on the road, if not more.
abstract: Hotels may have come late to technology, but recently they have been jumping in as travelers, especially those on business trips, demand to be constantly connected and expect hotels to make that possible; hotels now see technology as a way to stand out in the crowd of brands; different age groups and types of travelers expect different types of service.
lead_paragraph: As their homes have become more technologically advanced, travelers want at least as much technology on the road, if not more.

headline.main: Hotels Seek an Edge in Offering the Right Digital Perks
